term.title: curing

item.text: Chemical process of converting a prepolymer or a polymer into a polymer of higher molar mass and then into a network.

notes.item: Curing is achieved by the induction of chemical reactions which might or might not require mixing with a chemical curing agent.
Physical aging, crystallization, physical crosslinking and post-polymerization reactions are sometimes referred to as 'curing'. Use of the term 'curing' to describe such processes is deprecated.
